description: Perform binary search of event rate performance threshold

kwargs.help: Number of iterations to average over for each experiment.
When total number of pixels for a specific precision is determined, multiply by this number
Durations (total number of frames) of generated ssequences to find event performance threshold on.
Resolutions of generated ssequences to find event performance threshold on.
Wether to include more logging information to the standard output.
Mode of operation. 'compute_load' -- adjusts resolution or frame numbers to be bounded by precision requirements. 'dims_frames' -- searches on sequences with exact dimesions and number of frames.
Codec for which to compute the event rate performance threshold, in comparison with the selected entropy coder.
Relative path to entropy coder binary, which will be used as a baseline for threshold analysis. Example: lpaq1
